heading: HB01428
0: AN ACT INSTITUTING THE FREE NUTRI-MEALS PROGRAM IN PUBLIC ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOLS, PROVIDING MECHANISMS FOR ITS IMPLEMENTATION, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA11037 enacted on 2018-06-20 Substituted by HB05269
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01428
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTING THE FREE NUTRI-MEALS PROGRAM IN PUBLIC ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOLS, PROVIDING MECHANISMS FOR ITS IMPLEMENTATION, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Free Nutri-meals Program Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Directs the government to take a concerted efforts to institutionalize a Free Nutri-Meals Program for children in all public elementary and secondary schools to tackle the problem of hunger and malnutrition and to realize marked improvement in the attendance, nutrition, health and academic performances of the Filipino school children.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TUPAS, RAUL "BOBOY" C.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-12
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
